content:
Here is a list of books that I want to read (or started, but not finished). Just to clean my memory from it.
   Book Status Link Note     “Modern Java in Action: Lambdas, streams, functional and reactive programming” by Raoul-Gabriel Urma, Mario Fusco, Alan Mycroft todo Publisher    “RabbitMQ in Depth” by Gavin M. Roy todo Publisher    “Release It!” by Michael Nygard in progress Publisher    “Docker in Action”, 2nd Edition by by Jeff Nickoloff, Stephen Kuenzli in progress Publisher
